text: Ara apani mane karatena tara jege ache, athaca tara chila ghumanta [1]. Ara amara taderake pasa phiratama dana dike ebam bama dike [2] ebam tadera kukura chila samanera pa duâ€™ti guhara darajaya prasarita kare. Yadi apani tadera prati takiye dekhatena, tabe abasya'i apani pichane phire paliye yetena. Ara abasya'i apani tadera bhaye atankagrasta haye paratena
